definition: member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc

sentences.english: 'Our goal remains to be No. 1, ' said Mr. Saso, the Fujitsu executive.
sentences.chinese: 富士通的佐相秀幸說，我們的目標是全世界第一。

sentences.english: Fujitsu’s 42-inch monster is as good a place to mark it as any.
sentences.chinese: 富士通42寸的怪物便是其絕佳代表。

sentences.english: The irony is that under Mr Nozoe, Fujitsu was a model of corporate reform.
sentences.chinese: 領導下，富士通曾是企業改革的典範。

sentences.english: Fujitsu expects to sell about 50 supercomputers over the course of the next three years.
sentences.chinese: 富士通預測在今後三年內可以售出約50臺超級電腦。

sentences.english: Spare parts of current Fujitsu products as well as discontinued products is our specialty.
sentences.chinese: 零件目前富士通的產品，以及停售產品是我們的專長。

definition: Panasonic Corporation (formerly Matsushita Electric Industrial Co.)
Ricoh, Japanese imaging and electronics company
Olympus, Japanese manufacturer of cameras and optical instruments
